author: dain
msg: Changed JarFileClassLoader to extend URLClassLoader since a lot of code assume a URLClassLoader
Extraced a NamedClassLoader from JarFileClassLoader which only adds a name and proper clean up of static classloader registries
Switched configurations to use the NamedClassLoader for now

author: dain
msg: * Complete redesign of server startup code.
* Normal server startup is handled by the KernelMain object.  This object is not a java main class, but should be created, initialized and started from a java main class.

* Added SpringBootstrap java main class, which uses a Spring configuration file to create a GBean Main, which kernel main implements.  The default spring configuration is contained in the jar at META-INF/gbean-bootstrap.xml

* Added JarFileClassLoader which is a new implementation of a local file only URL class loader.  This class loader has a destroy method which closes all file handles, so the files can be deleted on windows.

author: dain
msg: Fixed bugs with using file configuration list for startup and shutdown

author: dain
msg: Changed spring loader and spring service factory to use named and default constructor args
Removed values from the spring.xml covered by defaults
